comments.body:
Should we also test these or are they supposed to fail?
```
  when: mydict['c'] is not defined
  when: mydict['c'] is undefined
```

Removed my fix since a better one was already merged.
I added tests for an is undefined conditional. These shouldn't fail with debug (as was happening), but will output something like
```
TASK [conditionals : test list with invalid element is undefined] ***********************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************
ok: [testhost] => {
    "failed": false,
    "mylist[0]": "VARIABLE IS NOT DEFINED!"
}
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +347,351 @@  assert:
    that:
    - "result.skipped == true"

- name: test list with invalid element is undefined
